translations: 憎恨（hate 的现在分词形式）；厌恶

phrs.translation: 不喜欢做某事；讨厌做某事；与生俱来厌恶
n. 仇恨犯罪；憎恨犯罪

sentences.sentence: He hastened away, hating her for it.
sentences.translation: 他赶紧走开了，为此恨她。

sentences.sentence: He was far from hating Tom the less when this thought occurred to him.
sentences.translation: 当他想到这一点时，他更加痛恨汤姆了。

sentences.sentence: It still amazes me that I completely changed from almost hating math to loving it!
sentences.translation: 我仍然感到震惊的是，我完全改变了，从几乎憎恨数学变成了喜欢它！
